degen.description: Degenerate gambler who apes into brand-new meme coins and high-APY farms without due diligence.
degen.default_scene: Full Degen Mode - A frog-eyed degen launches into the void, charts exploding behind him, surrounded by glowing tokens – no parachute, just pure YOLO.

copium.description: The fictional drug inhaled to ease the pain of losses or missed pumps.
copium.default_scene: A trader sitting in darkness surrounded by red candles, wearing a gas mask labeled COPIUM, huffing from a tank.
copium.default_caption: Still bullish after 90% dump. Copium engaged.

diamond_hands.description: Holding through all volatility with unbreakable conviction.
diamond_hands.default_scene: Diamondhands with mudra pose / thumbs up, background: bleeding chart + cosmic light.
diamond_hands.default_caption: Diamond hands 💎🤲 – selling is for mortals.

fomo.description: Fear of Missing Out, buying impulsively to catch the pump.
fomo.default_scene: Desperate frog character chasing a rocket labeled '100x' with panic eyes.
fomo.default_caption: Buy the top? Sure, can't miss the party!

holding.description: Originated from the typo HODL; keep your coins no matter what.
holding.default_scene: A zen-like RayGuy meditating while chaos unfolds behind him.
holding.default_caption: I am HODLING – deal with it.

jeet.description: Just Exit Early Trader who cashes out at first dip.
jeet.default_scene: Trader hits sell at +1%, screen shows +300% the next day, regret overlay.
jeet.default_caption: Jeet at 1× – watching others hit millies.

rekt.description: Total loss through liquidation or rugpull.
rekt.default_scene: A trader lying in a crater, blown up screen nearby, red candles raining.

rugpull.description: Developers pull liquidity and disappear, leaving token worthless.
rugpull.default_scene: Dev running away with bag of tokens, chart instantly nukes to zero.

valhalla.description: Mythic end goal where diamond hands finally pay off.
valhalla.default_scene: Glorious entrance of RayGuy into meme crypto Valhalla, rainbow rockets and god candles in background.

wagmi.description: Community rallying cry – We Are Gonna Make It!
wagmi.default_scene: Group of frog characters cheering with charts going green behind them.
